name: Dimension Hunter VR
description: Dimension Hunter allows you to immerse yourself in this tongue in cheek, over the top, retro-arcade experience, with a unique choice of free or railed movement. Fast paced, hardcore, fluid gameplay mechanics with a unique, and yet familiar, comic book style of carnage and gore.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
